question.title: Distribute Candies Among Children III
hints: Try to solve the problem using combinatorics.
If the limit didn’t exist, the problem would be distributing n candies between 3 children.
The answer to the above problem would be C(n + 2, 2).
Now try to combine this with the Inclusion-exclusion principle.
Apart from the above solution, there are other mathematical solutions that you can think of.
